job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Oda processes thousands of real estate images every day to better understand and serve to different audiences with evolving interests and tastes. As a machine learning engineer in our team, you'll help build and scale our cutting-edge Oda Optimization image processing and recommendation pipeline.
What you'll do:
Develop & Train & Monitor deep learning models to improve various Oda products.
Collect & Clean & Generate custom datasets for DL/ML model training.
Design and implement software solutions to improve our image processing pipeline to personalize services to different clients.
What we're looking for:
2+ years of industry experience
BS or MS in Computer Science, Statistics or related field
Experience working with CNN, Autoencoder and Transformer architectures
Expertise in Pytorch / Tensorflow or other GPU APIs
Hands-on experience with data processing pipelines, databases and large scale machine learning systems
Nice to have:
Background in recommendation or computational advertising
Working knowledge of Reinforcement Learning Algorithms.
